title: An additional appendix to Aurum regin√¶ making some further discoveries of the antiquity, legality, quiddity, quantity, quality of this royal duty, of the oblations, fines from which it ariseth, as well in Ireland as England, the process by, the lands, chattels out of which it is levyed, and that the unlevyed arears thereof at the Queen-consorts death, of right accrue to the king and none other, by his royal prerogative, and ought to be levyed for his use by the laws of the realm / collected by William Prynne, Esq. ...
author: Prynne, William, 1600-1669.
publisher: Printed for the author by Tho. Ratcliffe and Tho. Daniel, and are to be sold by Edward Thomas ... and Josias Robinson ...,
